definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: 'Will it be a success?' I kept asking myself.
sentences.chinese: “它将是一次成功的义演吗？”我不断地自问。

sentences.english: The proceeds from charity's performance will be contributed to building a Hope Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 这次义演的全部收入将用于建设一座希望小学。

sentences.english: All the money collected from this benefit performance will be used in building a Hope Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 这次义演的全部收入将用于建设一座希望小学。

sentences.english: The big day came at last . I am too nervous to host the charity show.
sentences.chinese: 那一天终于来了，我太紧张了怕主持不好那慈善义演。

sentences.english: We plan to hold the show indoors because it might rain.
sentences.chinese: 因为天可能会下雨，我们计划在室内举行义演。

sentences.english: It was a benefit performance for a political comedy group called the San Francisco Mime Troup.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个政治喜剧组义演称为旧金山默特鲁普。

sentences.english: Today I took part in a benefit performance, collecting funds for children.
sentences.chinese: 今天参加一个为小孩筹募基金的义演。

sentences.english: They arranged for a benefit concert.
sentences.chinese: 他们安排了一次义演音乐会。

sentences.english: Geldof organized the world's first global charity concert "Live Aid".
sentences.chinese: 他组织了世界上首次全球义演，取名“性命之助”。

sentences.english: The singers had a ----- ----- to ----- ----- -----the tsunami last week.
sentences.chinese: 上周歌手们为海啸义演筹款。

sentences.english: The proceeds from the charity's performance will be contributed to building a hope primary school.
sentences.chinese: 这次义演的全部收入将用于建设一座希望小学。

sentences.english: Many actors and actresses took part the charity performance.
sentences.chinese: 许多演员都参加了这场义演。

sentences.english: They all became very interested in charity shows because of you.
sentences.chinese: 因为你，他们都对慈善义演变得非常感兴趣。

definition: (theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
